checker package¶

Submodules¶

checker.checker module¶

checker.checker.check(data)[source]¶

start checking list with courses on input parametrs :param data: list :return: str

checker.checker.easy_checker(category, open_file)[source]¶

check if in list categories is input category or not. if not it check if input category is similar to at least one of the list. And returned similar to input. :param category: str :param open_file: str :return: str

checker.checker.search_language(language)[source]¶

search language in dict and then return language in iso 639.2 :param language: str :return: str

checker.checker.short_Jacquard_algorithm(text1, text2)[source]¶

analyze two texts It use a Jacquard algorithm? it means it delete all digits and punctuation delete repeated letters :param text1: str :param text2: str :return: float
